The Academic Period must be valid for the selected Academic Unit and Academic Level.
Cannot create Dynamic Application Grouping for Fixed only Academic Unit Configuration.
You can't create an application grouping with this combination of applicant types and campuses for this combination of grouping criteria because it overlaps with an existing application grouping.

Before creating application groupings with applicant types and locations, you must first create a default application grouping that only specifies the Academic Unit, Academic Level and Anticipated Start. This lets you capture applications not specified by another application grouping for this combination of grouping criteria.
